output.sentences: Support was at record highs during the new world series.
Fans screamed with utmost joy as Ramirez and Manny presented themselves to the world.
They waved, but not wanting to take up all of the limelight, they began to acknowledge their staff, boasting about the outstanding coaching they received over the years.
No rude gestures could be made at such a fantastic and fanatical organization, as everyone was beyond words beaming with jubilation.
Fans had gathered at this location for their biggest stars in their eyes, thrilled and anxious, wondering if they could ever meet their perfect heroes.
